title: Colorado National Monument: 8th Grade
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips     8th Grade                  8th Grade       Download:  Example 8th Grade Field Trip Schedule *Actual schedule will depend upon the number of students, ranger availability, time available for the field trip and length of programs chosen.  Program Option: Sheep and GPS in Monument Canyon (5 miles, 4 hours) Students will discover the role of GPS in monitoring and managing Desert Bighorn Sheep in the Monument. Along the way students will discover what sheep need in their habitat and how humans have played a role in their demise and survival in their history in the canyons. Science 2.1 Ecosystems and Human Activities
